Plot: A drama centered on the trials and tribulations of a proud Palestinian Christian immigrant single mother and her teenage son in small town Indiana.
Title: Amreeka
Actors: Nisreen Faour, Melkar Muallem, Hiam Abbass, Alia Shawkat
tomatoConsensus: A dramedy that's got a taste for the tragic as well as the poignantly comic, Amreeka adds a new sweetness to the hope and distress of the immigrant experience.
Country: USA, United Arab Emirates, Canada, Kuwait, Jordan
